name: Eldin's Quest
description:
Eldin's Quest is our final project for the first year of a game development grade. It's a 2D game. It's defined as a top-down-shooter and the art style is based on pixel art.

In this game you control the mage Eldin and you have to explore a dungeon with different zones, you also have to unlock new powerups that will help you defeat all your enemies. You can also collect pearls to upgrade your weapons.

You can also aldjust the difficulty of your playthrough, that will make your enemies stronger (or weaker) and also modify the amount of health or mana points you get when touching a potion.

Game developed by: Marc Martínez, Pablo Morer, Pau Bartolomé
